source: Vermont Department of Veterans Services and Vermont 211

resources.name: Vermont Agency of Veterans Services
resources.description: State agency providing veterans with accredited service officers for claims assistance, benefits counseling, and referral to housing, employment, and education programs.

resources.name: Vermont 211
resources.description: Free information and referral service connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food assistance, healthcare, and mental health services.

resources.name: Veterans Place Inc.
resources.description: Non-profit providing supportive housing, employment training, and comprehensive case management for homeless and at-risk Vermont veterans.

resources.name: Vermont Veterans' Home
resources.description: State-operated facility providing residential care, assisted living, and nursing services for Vermont veterans and their spouses.

resources.name: Vermont Veterans Economic Development Program
resources.description: Provides business development support, loans, and procurement opportunities for veteran entrepreneurs starting or expanding businesses.

resources.name: Vermont Veterans Employment Services
resources.description: Department of Labor program offering job training, job placement, and career counseling for Vermont veterans.

resources.name: Vermont Veterans Legal Services
resources.address: University of Vermont Law School, Burlington, VT 05401
resources.description: Law school clinic providing free legal assistance to veterans for VA claims, discharge upgrades, and family law issues.

resources.name: Vermont Mental Health Services for Veterans
resources.description: 24/7 crisis support and mental health services for veterans experiencing emotional distress or suicidal thoughts.

resources.name: Vermont Food Bank
resources.description: Provides emergency food assistance to veterans experiencing food insecurity, with distribution through community partner agencies.

resources.name: White River Junction VA Medical Center
resources.address: 215 North Main Street, White River Junction, VT 05009
resources.description: Federal VA medical facility providing comprehensive healthcare, mental health services, and rehabilitation for Vermont veterans.
